definitions.definition: To make the shrill sound characteristic of a rooster ; to make a sound in this manner, either in gaiety , joy , pleasure , or defiance .
To shout in exultation or defiance ; to brag .
examples: He’s been crowing all day about winning the game of cards.

definitions.definition: To test the reed of a double reed instrument by placing the reed alone in the mouth and blowing it.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To make the shrill sound characteristic of a rooster ; to make a sound in this manner, either in gaiety , joy , pleasure , or defiance .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To shout in exultation or defiance ; to brag .
( intransitive , music ) To test the reed of a double reed instrument by placing the reed alone in the mouth and blowing it.
